title: Assorted T cards for sale/trade HOFers
author: Mikehealer

posts.post_title: Assorted T cards for sale/trade HOFers
posts.post_content:
The following are for sale or would trade for Johnny Evers 
Cards I need. Prices include shipping. 


T205 John McGraw-PSA 5 Piedmont 42-$225
T216 Chief Bender-SGC 30 Kotton(thin)-$650
T216 Bresnahan-SGC 40 Kotton-$440

E95 Plank-SGC 20-[STRIKE]$575[/STRIKE]SOLD
T205 Fred Clarke-PSA 3 Piedmont 42-[STRIKE]$75[/STRIKE]SOLD
T206 Frank Chance(red port)SGC 20 Hindu-[STRIKE]$975[/STRIKE]SOLD
T206 Red Ames(port)-SGC 20 Hindu-[STRIKE]$275[/STRIKE]SOLD

Email with any questions [url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url]

Link to scans [url]http://imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/mycollection[/url]

Thanks
Mike
I'll take the T205 clarke if it is still available.

Email sent on the E95 Plank.  Thanks!

Lovely Day...

Iggy, I replied to your email. Have you not received it. 

Mike

Clarke arrived today safe and sound.  Thanks for the transaction.  This is a great looking card that I'm happy to add to my collection.

Brian
